title: Get to Know Sales Cloud Unit | Salesforce Trailhead

questions.title: 1 Which of the following best defines CRM, Sales Cloud, and Salesforce?

answers.content: A CRM is a company, and Sales Cloud is a product it offers.
B Salesforce is the company that pioneered CRM in the cloud, and Sales Cloud is a product it offers.

wrongAnswers.content: C CRM stands for companies, relationships, and making money.
D Salesforce is a product made only for salespeople.

correctAnswer.content: B Salesforce is the company that pioneered CRM in the cloud, and Sales Cloud is a product it offers.

questions.title: 2 Which sales best practice should you follow?

answers.content: A The best sales reps memorize their customer information.
D You should keep your customer information in one place, accessible by your whole team, so you can sell faster and smarter and be prepared to grow.

wrongAnswers.content: C The creator of your sales software knows best, so don't worry about being able to customize a solution to your needs.
B When your business grows, the best thing to do is use the same sales processes but hire more reps.

correctAnswer.content: D You should keep your customer information in one place, accessible by your whole team, so you can sell faster and smarter and be prepared to grow.

questions.title: 3 Which of these is true about how Sales Cloud can help you grow your business?

answers.content: C Sales Cloud gives you real-time reports of how your business is doing.

wrongAnswers.content: B It's impossible to scale a sales organization.
A Salespeople spend 95% of their time selling, and that's what Sales Cloud is all about.
D Sales Cloud will help you leap tall buildings in single bound.

correctAnswer.content: C Sales Cloud gives you real-time reports of how your business is doing.
